title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 250 - DEFINITIONS AND STANDARDS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 250 - DEFINITIONS AND STANDARDS
State Regulations
§ 250.1 - Foods
§ 250.2 - Dietary food labeling requirements
§ 250.3 - Labeling of fresh produce treated with post-harvest wax or resin
§ 250.4 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 250

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 16, 18, 201[a], 214-b, 215-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
